name: holygrailcss
description: A minimal, responsive, style-agnostic CSS framework.

scripts.docs: node-sass scss/docs.scss doc/docs.css --output-style expanded && node-sass scss/docs.scss doc/docs.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build: node-sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css --output-style expanded && node-sass scss/style.scss dist/style.min.css --output-style compressed

author: Manuel Ruiz
